name: I'm Beside You Inc
description: In the midst of a rapidly growing online presence with the Covid-19 environment, the irreplaceable individuality of each person is becoming increasingly difficult to see. Our AI, which is more considerate to people than humans, makes communication visible and changes the environment to make it easier for each individual to live as he or she is. We will continue to take on the challenge to create a kind society where everyone can truly believe that "Everyone is different and that's good". We visualize you’re one and only.
Headline: A video analysis AI service that enables online communication tailored to each individual's personality.
ShortDescription: In the midst of a rapidly growing online presence with the Covid-19 environment, the irreplaceable individuality of each person is becoming increasingly difficult to see.

Highlights.name: AI-powered Solutions for Communication, Sales, and Education
Highlights.description: I'm BesideYou is an AI company that develops technology to improve communication, sales, and education results [1]. Their AI platform can be used in a variety of applications, and they likely offer custom solutions to meet the specific needs of each client.

Highlights.name: Proven Success in Boosting Efficiency and Sales
Highlights.description: I'm BesideYou's AI platform has been shown to be successful in multiple case studies [1]. For example, they mention increasing communication efficiency and sales results at AstraZeneca and reducing churn and doubling enrollment at Banzan. These case studies suggest that I'm BesideYou's AI can deliver real-world results for businesses.

Highlights.name: Founded with a Mission to Empower Individuals
Highlights.description: I'm BesideYou was founded by a group of parents who wanted to change the world's standard of measurement to something that suits the individuality of each person [1]. This suggests that I'm BesideYou is a company that is motivated by a desire to make a positive impact on the world, not just to generate profits.

enhanced_description: I'm Beside You Inc offers a video analysis AI service designed to make online communication more visible and tailored to individual personalities. This AI aims to empower individuals by recognizing and valuing their unique individuality, especially in a rapidly growing online environment. The technology is applied to improve communication, sales, and education outcomes, fostering an environment where every individual can thrive. Founded in 2020 with a mission to empower individuals, the company focuses on creating a kind society where everyone can truly believe that 'Everyone is different and that's good'.
key_use_cases: Personalizing communication based on individual personality
competitive_advantages: AI focused on recognizing and valuing individual personality
Ability to visualize unique individuality in online interactions
Mission-driven approach to creating a kinder society
Demonstrated success in boosting communication efficiency and sales results
